content: --भर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} excessive, vehement, violent, much, strong; त्रपाभरनिर्भरस्मरशर &c. <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 42.</ls> {2} ardent. {3} fast, close (as embrace); कुचकुंभनिर्भरपरीरंभामृतं वांछति <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; परिरभ्य निर्भरं <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {4} sound, deep (as sleep). {5} full of, filled with (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); आनंद°, गर्व° &c. (--रः a servant receiving no wages. (--रं excess. (--रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} excessively, exceedingly, intensely. {2} soundly.
